SELECT n.notice_id AS id, n.title, COALESCE(c.name, '미분류') AS categoryName, n.created_at AS createdAt, CASE WHEN ua.account_id IS NULL THEN '탈퇴한 사용자' ELSE ua.name END AS createdByName FROM notice n LEFT JOIN user_account ua ON n.created_by = ua.account_id LEFT JOIN notice_category c ON n.category_id = c.category_id AND c.is_deleted = 'N' WHERE n.com_id = #{cond.companyId} AND n.is_deleted = 'N'
AND n.category_id = #{cond.categoryId}
AND ( n.title LIKE #{keywordLike} OR n.content LIKE #{keywordLike} )
ORDER BY
n.created_at
n.created_at
ASC
DESC
LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT n.notice_id AS noticeId, n.title AS title, n.content AS content,
c.category_id AS categoryId, c.name AS categoryName,
n.created_by AS createdBy, CASE WHEN cua.account_id IS NULL THEN '탈퇴한 사용자' ELSE cua.name END AS createdByName,
n.updated_by AS updatedBy, CASE WHEN uua.account_id IS NULL THEN '탈퇴한 사용자' ELSE uua.name END AS updatedByName, n.created_at AS createdAt, n.updated_at AS updatedAt
FROM notice n LEFT JOIN notice_category c ON n.category_id = c.category_id
LEFT JOIN user_account cua ON n.created_by = cua.account_id
LEFT JOIN user_account uua ON n.updated_by = uua.account_id
WHERE n.notice_id = #{noticeId} AND n.com_id = #{companyId} AND n.is_deleted = 'N'
SELECT attachment_id AS id, url, original_name AS originalName FROM notice_attachment WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId} AND is_used = true
